ValidationRule.description: Start Date must be in the future where the lead is open
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Open'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Contacted'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Revisit') ), OR( ISCHANGED(Estimated_Start_Date__c), ISCHANGED(Status) ), Estimated_Start_Date__c <= TODAY() )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please update the 'Estimated Start Date' to a date in the future.
